pages.title: Bird Whistles
pages.text: Useful to help move Chocobos about with ease$(br)Leads do not work

pages.title: Straw Nest
pages.text: Only Visually bugged when placed on ground after the first chicbo is born$(br)safe to break 'after' the chicbo is born$(br)Shift Right click to view it's inventory & if it actually has an egg

pages.title: Chocopedia
pages.text: This is only useful for Seeing the 'stats' & gender of the chocobos

pages.title: Saddle Bags
pages.text: small Inventory Chocobo Container w/ Riding

pages.title: Saddle Packs
pages.text: Large Inventory Chocobo Container w/ Riding
